participant_1.name: Jordan Miller
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and determined, Jordan tends to pursue his dreams despite obstacles. He has a flair for fashion and enjoys material luxuries.
participant_1.background: my family doesn't support my career choices. i currently work for a watch dealer. my dream car is a rolls royce ghost. i often shop for shoes and watches. i like shopping.

participant_2.name: Emily Carter
participant_2.personality: Creative and hopeful, Emily has a passion for music and strives to share her talent with the world. She is hardworking and practical.
participant_2.background: my favorite type of music to sing is folk music. i'm a musician and hope to make it big some day. i play the piano and guitar and sing. i also work as a custodian to help pay the bills.
